resources.string: Album artwork from your music library
Artwork will only be downloaded if a WiFi connection is available.
Muzei Music Extension needs permission to access your notifications, in order to see which song is currently playing.
In order to listen for song changes, Muzei Music Extension needs to register as a notification listener. This is required due to changes in Android 8.0.
Muzei Music Extension is not enabled as a Notification Listener. The app will not function correctly otherwise.
